## Warm-up

1.  What does the following code do? How would you write it without a pipe?

    ```{r, echo = T, eval = F}
    flips <- factor(c("H", "T", "H", "H"), levels = c("H", "T"))
    sum(as.numeric(flips))
    ```

## Warm-up
